content: Securities Investments STI ETF ETF Asked by AnonymousAsked on 21 Mar 2019Is the STI truly representative of the benchmark index in singapore since it is quite heavily weighted towards banks?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 26 Mar 2019Honestly speaking STI is pretty mediocre. Like you said, heavily weighted towards banks, it only hold 30 companies and mediocre returns. Investing in S&P 500, MSCI world index or other global index might be a better choice if you are comfortable in investing overseas but do your research first before u buy.0 comments0
